web_snippets: Greg Koukl ... Gregory Koukl (born June 10, 1950) is a Christian apologist and radio talk show host. He is the founder of the Christian apologetics organization ...
Greg Koukl is a writer, public speaker and talk show host who's spent 30 years advocating for and defending the Christian worldview.
Greg Koukl is a Christian apologist, radio talk show host, author, speaker and founder of the Christian apologetics organization Stand to Reason.
